title: Permutation ESports Looking for Players
body:
Following todays trial (with mixed results) we have for the moment decided we need more players.
If you are a serious player interested in trialing , message me in game for an interview.
We are aiming to schedule the next phase of trials on monday 7th december @ 4.00pm NSW Time.
IGN: BurstFire301
NOTE: Must have working Mic + Teamspeak/Skype
